testcase.name: Verify user should be redirect on changepassword page or not
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Home Page and verify page title............................passed When user click on login Section............................................passed Then user redirect on Login popup...........................................passed Then user logining via gmail................................................passed Then user click on order section............................................passed Then user click on changepassword link......................................passed Then Verify Page Should be Redirect on changepassword page..................passed

testcase.name: Verify Without entering changepassword user cant submit
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Home Page and verify page title............................passed When user click on login Section............................................passed Then user redirect on Login popup...........................................passed Then user logining via gmail................................................passed Then user click on order section............................................passed Then user click on changepassword link......................................passed Then user click on submit button & Verify Error message.....................passed
